Key Match Events: Boston Celtics outscored the Atlanta Hawks 35-4 in fast-break points
Jayson Tatum scored 28 points on 10-for-21 shooting
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Boston Celtics are off to their best start since the 2019-20 season, when they opened with a 10-1 record
Others: The Celtics will face a tough matchup against the Golden State Warriors in their next game
